I googled on internet, it seemed like everyone's having the same problem on RegistryBooster, no one has the problem with SpyEraser. I only run NOD32 v3.0.642.9.0 and the TeaTimer of Spybot S&D 1.6.2 memory resident on an Intel E7200 clocked at 3.4 Ghz and 2 GB of ram so PowerSuite isn't affecting XP SP2 performance.  Don't run Spyware Doctor 6.0 memory resident as that is most definitely a resource hog and performance drain.
